FuncDef: The display nqa-server command displays the status of an NQA test server.
Examples: NQA Server Max: 5000                   NQA Server Num: 3
NQA Concurrent TCP Server: 1           NQA Concurrent UDP Server: 2
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Both the server and client must be configured before starting a TCP or UDP jitter test instance. Otherwise, a test instance cannot be started.
If a TCP test instance is used, run the nqa-server tcpconnect command to enable a TCP server.If a UDP jitter test instance used, run the nqa-server udpecho command to enable a UDP server.
The display nqa-server command displays the status of a server. Each time a server is enabled, the count of the servers of this type increases by one.
